cast.name: Michael Gabriel Goodfriend Michael Gabriel Goodfriend
奥克萨娜·巴尤尔 Oksana Baiul

introduction: Meet the Gastineu Girls. No, they are not sisters. They're a mother and daughter duo of NY socialities who are best friends-and sometimes each other's biggest competition. With good looks, an elite circle of friends and a posh NYC apartment, Lisa and Brittney Gastineau live a life that many would envy. Despite their pampered appearance, they are both a few glittering short accessories short of their dream lives. E! cameras follow the ladies as they search for fame, fortune, romance, and the perfect man.
